contest-event.event-date:
April 4, 1936 D West Riding Contest (2nd Section)
West Riding Contest (2nd Section) 20 Test Piece Contest West Riding Contest west-riding-contest-2nd-section
The Talisman [Balfe, unknown arranger]
Victoria Hall, Saltaire, Shipley, Yorkshire March contest held in conjunction with section 1 - 1st Bradford City, 2nd Flockton, 3rd Canal Ironworks, 4th Clayton Subscription. 9 bands competed.
Aug. 25, 2013, 8:07 p.m. Jan. 9, 2019, 2:37 p.m.
1 Ossett Borough R. C. Scott
2 Clayton Subscription Fred Berry
3 Yeadon Old Band Walter Jackson
4 Silsden Town Band J. Hillary
5 Guiseley Brass Band W. Stevenson
Unknown Result Armley and Wortley Prize Band H. B. Fieldhouse
Unknown Result Wakefield Old A. H. Mitchell
Unknown Result Bradford Victoria Tom Atkinson
Unknown Result Baildon John Paley
